title: Run Rudy Run! Racist Jeep Sells Better? 2.24.21
itunes:title: Run Rudy Run! Racist Jeep Sells Better? 2.24.21
description:
In episode 818, Jack and Miles are joined by investigative journalist and Uprising: A Guide From Portland co-host Garrison Davis to discuss Texas corporations screwing over their workers, Rudy Giuliani avoiding process servers, coronavirus disproportionately killing people of color, the Jeep Cherokee, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Big Texas Corporations Demand Storm Survivors Go Without Pay
  2. Giuliani Desperately Tried To Dodge Process Servers In Dominion Defamation Lawsuit
  3. THE COLOR OF CORONAVIRUS: COVID-19 DEATHS BY RACE AND ETHNICITY IN THE U.S.
  4. Cherokee Nation to Jeep: Stop using the tribe’s name
  5. When Cars Assume Ethnic Identities
  6. Cleveland Indians changed their name, now for the rest of the racism in corporate America
  7. WHAT’S IN A NAME?
  8. WATCH: Wild Steam - Cafe Music BGM Channel

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
